scripts.postinstall: cd third_party/docusaurus-search-local && npm i && npm run build
scripts.roll: rm -rf nodejs/docs/* && rm -rf python/docs/* && rm -rf java/docs/* && node src/generator.js
scripts.build-java: npm run cleanup && cp -r java/* . && node --max-old-space-size=4096 node_modules/@docusaurus/core/bin/docusaurus build --out-dir=build/java
scripts.build-nodejs: npm run cleanup && cp -r nodejs/* . && node --max-old-space-size=4096 node_modules/@docusaurus/core/bin/docusaurus build --out-dir=build
scripts.build-python: npm run cleanup && cp -r python/* . && node --max-old-space-size=4096 node_modules/@docusaurus/core/bin/docusaurus build --out-dir=build/python
scripts.build: rm -rf build && npm run build-java && npm run build-nodejs && npm run build-python
scripts.version-java: npm run prepare-java && docusaurus docs:version 1.9.0 && cp -r docs/* java/docs/ && cp -r versioned_docs/* java/versioned_docs/ && cp -r versioned_sidebars/* java/versioned_sidebars/ && cp versions.json java/
scripts.version-node: npm run prepare-nodejs && docusaurus docs:version 1.8.0 && cp -r docs/* nodejs/docs/ && cp -r versioned_docs/* nodejs/versioned_docs/ && cp -r versioned_sidebars/* nodejs/versioned_sidebars/ && cp versions.json nodejs/
scripts.version-python: npm run prepare-python && docusaurus docs:version 1.8.0 && cp -r docs/* python/docs/ && cp -r versioned_docs/* python/versioned_docs/ && cp -r versioned_sidebars/* python/versioned_sidebars/ && cp versions.json python/
scripts.cleanup: rm -rf docs versioned_docs versioned_sidebars docusaurus.config.js versions.json sidebars.js
